event.title: the May 5 election for Mayor, City Council and School Board now

data.event: With the May 5 election for Mayor, City Council and School Board now less than two months away, the list of candidates for the school board election is now available on the Virginia State Board of Elections (VSBE) website.

data.event: With the May 5 election for Mayor, City Council and School Board now less than two months away, the list of candidates for the school board election is now available on the Virginia State Board of Elections (VSBE) website.

data.event: The Board selects its own Chairman and Vice Chairman at the start of each fiscal year (July 1)According to the Alexandria City Public Schools (ACPS) website, the School Board â€œadopts policy for the daily operation of schools and sees that school laws are properly explained, enforced and observed.
